recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Sourdough Loaf
recipes.description: Moist and warmly spiced, this loaf captures the cozy flavors of autumn.

recipes.title: Apple Cinnamon Sourdough Rolls
recipes.description: Tender rolls swirled with cinnamon sugar and diced apples — perfect for fall mornings.

recipes.title: Maple Walnut Sourdough Bread
recipes.description: A hearty, nutty loaf sweetened with maple syrup — great with butter or cheese.

recipes.title: Lemon Lavender Sourdough Loaf
recipes.description: A light, fragrant loaf infused with lemon zest and dried lavender — perfect for brunch.

recipes.title: Herb & Garlic Sourdough Focaccia
recipes.description: Crispy on the outside and soft inside, topped with fresh rosemary, thyme, and roasted garlic.

recipes.title: Strawberry Sourdough Sweet Rolls
recipes.description: Soft, tangy sweet rolls filled with fresh strawberry compote and topped with a light glaze.

recipes.title: Grilled Sourdough Flatbread
recipes.description: Easy-to-make flatbreads cooked on the grill, perfect for summer BBQs and picnics.

recipes.title: Sourdough Burger Buns
recipes.description: Soft and fluffy burger buns that hold up beautifully to juicy summer burgers.

recipes.title: Peach & Basil Sourdough Galette
recipes.description: A rustic sourdough pastry filled with ripe peaches and fragrant basil — a true taste of summer.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cranberry Sourdough
recipes.description: Rich and festive, with dark chocolate chunks and tart cranberries.

recipes.title: Sourdough Stuffing Loaf
recipes.description: Savory loaf flavored with herbs and onions — perfect for holiday dinners.

recipes.title: Cinnamon Hot Cocoa Sourdough Rolls
recipes.description: Sweet sourdough rolls swirled with cocoa and cinnamon, topped with marshmallow glaze.
